feed.title: VaulTLS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VaulTLS: v.0.5.0
entry.content:
v0.5.0 - First Relase

This is the first release of VaulTLS. I hope it is the start of something good. In the end, I wrote it, because I needed a problem fix. If I can even help a single other person, I consider this a bonus.

entry.title: New release for VaulTLS: v0.5.1
entry.content:
v0.5.1

  • Fix certificate OpenSSL creation using the wrong time stamp and serial number
  • Switch private keys to elliptic curves (X9_62_PRIME256V1)
  • Reload API state after first setup

entry.title: New release for VaulTLS: v0.5.2
entry.content: This minor release is brought to you by the first bug report in this repository - Change the Vue validity field type during the setup (fixes #21)

entry.title: New release for VaulTLS: v0.5.3
entry.content:
This release is mostly to also provide an arm64 container image. I can however not test arm64 builds.

  • Add arm64 build to GitHub Action
  • Add basic logs
  • Verify mail server when configured
